front.title: Automated Certificate Management Environment (ACME) Extension for Public Key Challenges

abstract.t: This document specifies an extension to the ACME protocol [RFC8555] that enables ACME servers to use the public key authentication protocol to verify the certificate applicant's control of the identity and to ensure strong consistency between the final certificate issued and the identity of the application order. A process extension for removing CSR at the certificate application phase is also proposed in this document.
